attributes.action: introduce and implement a national policy to reduce light pollution in the UK's skies, covering all forms of lighting fixtures (including but not limited to floodlighting, advertising and streetlighting).
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We ask the Prime Minister to set national targets for reducing light pollution (and the consequent energy wastage), ensure that light pollution assessments are made a compulsory part of the planning process, and ensure that all street and road lights are gradually replaced with more light-efficient types (rather than just concentrating on Floodlighting of public buildings).

We ask that a Planning Policy Statement (or an Annexe to Planning Policy Statement 23: Planning and Pollution Control) to be introduced, detailing an official policy on Light Pollution to support this.
